channel.title: CVE Feed for Puppet -- Puppet Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Puppet -- Puppet Agent

item.title: CVE-2018-6515|2024-08-05T06:10:10.111Z -- puppet -- puppet%20agent
item.description: Puppet Agent 1.10.x prior to 1.10.13, Puppet Agent 5.3.x prior to 5.3.7, and Puppet Agent 5.5.x prior to 5.5.2 on Windows only, with a specially crafted configuration file an attacker could get pxp-agent to load arbitrary code with privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2018-6514|2024-08-05T06:10:10.097Z -- puppet -- puppet%20agent
item.description: In Puppet Agent 1.10.x prior to 1.10.13, Puppet Agent 5.3.x prior to 5.3.7, Puppet Agent 5.5.x prior to 5.5.2, Facter on Windows is vulnerable to a DLL preloading attack, which could lead to a privilege escalation.
